subject: Re: [R] about lex/yacc
body:
elyakhlifi mustapha wrote:> hello,> what about these functions lex/yacc which can parse and recognize a syntax?> thanks>   What about them? There are books, notably an O'Reilly one by D.Brown, as well as works on parser theory (Aho+Sethi+Ullman, e.g.).
(This is more than a bit off-topic for this list).
